channel.title: CVE Feed for Emerson -- WirelessHART Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Emerson -- WirelessHART Gateway

item.title: CVE-2021-42542|2024-09-16T17:52:49.145Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to directory traversal due to mishandling of provided backup folder structure.

item.title: CVE-2021-42539|2024-09-16T18:03:13.053Z -- emerson -- wirelesshart%20gateway
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a missing permission validation on system backup restore, which could lead to account take over and unapproved settings change.
